I

IDisplayObject - Interface in Framework
The IDisplayObject instance contains all the data for displaying something by an ICore instance.
IInput - Interface in Framework
IInput implementations access input from Env3D.
IWorld - Interface in Framework
IWorld implementations provide the virtual world functionality for the simulation.

W

WorldDoesNotExistException - Exception in Exceptions
The WorldDoesNotExistException class: an instance is thrown when someone tries to do something to a non-existent Env3D world.
